name: Dusk Point
description:
• Julia Abud - Programming and Implementation
  • Jonathan Perry - Sound and Music
  • Both - idea, game design, testing

Technical Data:

  • Engine: Unity3D
  • Plugin : XR Interaction Toolkit
  • Supported HMDs : 
    • Oculus Quest (tested)
    • Headsets that use OpenVR
    • Other Oculus Headsets
  • Other Assets used: 
    • 3d models:  Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack by JustCreate (free)
    • SkyBox: AllSky by rpgwhitelock (bought)
